item.title: About me
item.description: Hello, I’m Yan Pitangui, a software developer based in Brazil. I started as a fullstack developer, but over time I focused on backend and Azure. I really like working with C#/.NET, JS/TS and I also started to learn Rust. Lately I’ve been studying cloud native computing (with Orleans) and observability (with OpenTelemetry). Here you will find material that I share in the hope that it will be useful to someone.
